SEARCH
Package Util

Class ValidationHelper

java.lang.Object
Util.ValidationHelper
public class ValidationHelper extends Object
A utility class providing various methods for validating input values and performing type conversions. This class includes methods for parsing strings to numeric types, checking character and integer ranges, and validating strings against specific criteria.
Author:
Ildar Sadykov, Diane Mathew (dmm7029@psu.edu)

      public static boolean isCharInRange(char ch, String range)
      Validate a given character is in range

      Determine if the given character is in an allowed range

      Parameters:
      ch - The character being validated
      range - The string holding valid characters
      Returns:
      true if the character is in range

      Returns:

    • isIntInRange

      public static boolean isIntInRange(int value, int start, int end)
      Validates whether an integer is within a specified range.
      Parameters:
      value - the integer value to validate
      start - the inclusive start of the range
      end - the inclusive end of the range
      Returns:
      true if the value is within the range, otherwise false
